title.narrative: F.a: Building Union Power in Colombia

description.narrative: The goal of IndustriALL, SASK and two Finnish affiliates in Colombia is to continue supporting the mentioned industrial unions in their efforts to build a more unified and stronger trade union movement that organizes all groups of workers. The project will implement the joint union policy for women and young workers, support the participation of the unions in the consolidation of the peace process in their country, and pay more attention to organizing contract and agency labour and workers in MNCs. In colle ctive bargaining, the mining and energy unions aim at reaching centralized negotiations with coverage of the sectors as a whole. The unions participate in a cooperation forum together with political actors, civil society and local communities, the aim of w hich is to promote sustainable energy and environmental policies. Because of the work, the unions gain more negotiation power and function in more democratic ways, as well as represent groups that have not been adequately paid attention to (young workers, women workers, contract and agency workers). The unions act more strongly as agents of change in society, in the fields of peace and stability as well as sustainable industrial and energy policies. Industry workers, especially those in mining and energy se ctors, are the beneficiaries. The project is implemented by four Colombian affiliates of IndustriALL and managed by IndustriALL.
